roleset.name: fight mildly

example.name: the one example
example.text: On Wall Street men and women walk with great purpose , noticing one another only when they jostle for cabs .

roleset.note: JOSTLE-V NOTES: Unlike 'fight' (etc), this seems to only take a plural subjectincluding both the fighter and the co-fighter(s), which are separateargs for the 'fight' class. This sense doesn't seem to fit the VN class 'push', which would be something like "He jostled the lamp as he fell". (from jostle.01-v)
